text: Vladimir Aleksandrovich Shatalov (; December 8, 1927 â€“ June 15, 2021) was a Soviet cosmonaut. He flew three space missions of the Soyuz programme: Soyuz 4, Soyuz 8, and Soyuz 10.Spacefacts. Spacefacts.de. Retrieved on August 4, 2012. Shatalov died on June 15, 2021, at age 93. ==References== Category:1927 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Cosmonauts Category:North Kazakhstan Region
